query: When was the last time my Body Mass Index was measured?
resource_summaries:
This is an Observation resource for a patient's Body Mass Index (BMI) recorded on July 7, 2020, with a value of 32.08 kg/m2.
This is a summary of an encounter where a general examination of the patient was performed by Dr. Elva Langosh at NEWTON-WELLESLEY UROLOGY, PC on June 24, 2014.
answer: The last time your Body Mass Index (BMI) was measured was on July 7, 2020, with a value of 32.08 kg/m2.
